meals.name: African Jollof with Kanda and Native Fish
meals.description: Delicious smoky African jollof rice served with spicy kanda (cow skin) and seasoned native fish. A hearty, flavorful dish packed with traditional taste.

meals.name: Assorted Meat Stew Sauce with White Rice
meals.description: Tender assorted meats stewed in rich tomato sauce served with fluffy white rice. A spicy and savory delight that’s sure to satisfy.

meals.name: African Jollof with Fried Chicken and Plantain
meals.description: Perfectly cooked jollof rice paired with crispy fried chicken and sweet ripe plantains. A classic West African combo.

meals.name: Vegetable Sauce with White Rice
meals.description: Healthy and colorful vegetable sauce served with white rice. Rich in nutrients and bursting with flavor.

meals.name: White Native Rice with Stake
meals.description: Local white rice paired with tender, juicy steak. A satisfying fusion of native and modern flavors.

meals.name: Barbecue Fish with White Rice and Sauce
meals.description: Grilled barbecue fish served with seasoned white rice and spicy sauce. A premium dish for seafood lovers.

meals.name: Food Tray with Assorted Meals
meals.description: A large food tray packed with assorted meals including rice, meats, sauces, and sides. Perfect for parties and family sharing.

meals.name: African Native Rice with Native Fish and Veggies
meals.description: Native rice cooked with herbs, paired with fresh fish and sautéed vegetables. A wholesome traditional favorite.

meals.name: Chicken Goat Meat Pepper Soup with White Rice
meals.description: Spicy pepper soup loaded with chicken and goat meat, served with white rice and seasoned vegetables. A comforting and warming meal.

meals.name: Fried Rice with Fried Chicken and Veggies
meals.description: Classic fried rice with crispy fried chicken and mixed vegetables. A crowd-pleasing favorite for all occasions.
